==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|い|こく|じん|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Combination of [[異国|ikoku]] "foreign country" and [[人|jin]] "person".

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|いこくじん}}

# a person from a foreign country; an alien, a foreign national; a person who is not Japanese
#* 1603-1604: [[w:Nippo Jisho|Nippo Jisho]] (page 329)
#*: '''Icocujin'''. <small>イコクジン</small> 外国人、あるいは、他国の人

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|外国人|がいこくじん}}
* {{ja-r|異人|いじん}}
* {{ja-r|異邦人|いほうじん}}
